HEADLINE: With reference to the Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we would like to inform you that the Company will hold its Investor Call on Thursday, November 1, 2018 at 4.00 p.m. The Management of the Company will host the call to discuss the Company's financial performance, the detail of which is enclosed herewith.

You are requested to take the same on your records.
